messages.subject: Re: Back after a long hiatus...with a gift :)
messages.msgSnippet: Glad you enjoyed it...I will have many more videos to come so be on the look out or subscribe to my channel! I want use youtube to increase the image of
messages.messageBody:
Glad you enjoyed it...I will have many more videos to come so be on
the look out or subscribe to my channel!

I want use youtube to increase the image of unschooling as a positive
option for parents everywhere - cause it is!!

Peace,
Jenn
http://www.radiantorganics.biz

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Back after a long hiatus...with a gift :)
messages.msgSnippet: That was the sweetest song I ve ever heard Susie ... From: jenn To:
messages.messageBody:
That was the sweetest song I've ever heard
Susie
----- Original Message -----
From: jenn<mailto:radiantorganics@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com<mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 30, 2008 8:13 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Back after a long hiatus...with a gift :)


Hey there friends,

I haven't posted in a while and want to get back with all of you. I'm
a better unschooling parent when I have other's to share with and
relate to (and occasionally offer my advice/experience).

Ok, here's my gift: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7iNULdfDrxI<http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7iNULdfDrxI>

Enjoy :)

More soon...
Jenn





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
